title: Consistent problems with champ select since latest patch
body:
The league client keeps freezing or going black while i'm in queue or in champ select and it just caused me to dodge champ select
http://i.imgur.com/s4Gx3DD.png

happens consistently

back in queue, black screen

http://i.imgur.com/ptTQKNQ.png

menu's are working fine but champ select is not visible

http://i.imgur.com/aPiStv8.png

aaand another dodge....

http://i.imgur.com/S1sjmZi.png

replies.body:
Ouch, sorry to hear this hit you a few times so far. :\

This is actually a [**known issue**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/MihNFhcV-hot-issue-black-screen-during-champion-select-beta-client) on the Beta Client that occurs specifically in the transition between the lobby and champ select. I'd like you to try a workaround that some players have had success with. This workaround is collapsing your friends list groups **before** you enter the queue for a match. Below is a screenshot of what that looks like:

(Click to enlarge)
https://imgur.com/a/GJulP

Let me know if this worked for you.
